visits.text: Last free morning for souvenir shopping in Grand Baie: rums, spices, textiles.

activities.text: Last swim in the turquoise lagoon before departure.
Farewell lunch with Mauritian specialties before takeoff.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Snorkeling in the marine park of Blue Bay, one of the most beautiful spots on the island.
Visit to the Chamarel Rum Distillery and tasting of local colored rums.
Discovery of the 7 Coloured Earths of Chamarel, a unique geological phenomenon.

activities.text: Visit to Chamarel waterfall, a spectacular 100-meter waterfall.
Observation of giant tortoises at La Vanille park in the late afternoon.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Visit to Notre-Dame Auxiliatrice church with its red roof in Cap Malheureux, emblem of the island.
Discovery of the Pamplemousses Botanical Garden with its giant water lilies and rare palm trees.
Visit to L'Aventure du Sucre, interactive museum on the sugar history of Mauritius.

activities.text: Tasting of local rums and flavored sugars at the museum shop.
Sunset stroll on Coin de Mire beach with view of the islet.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Seven Coloured Earths and Chamarel waterfall
Walk in Ebony Forest reserve to Point Sublime
Visit to Chamarel Rum Distillery

activities.text: Optional ascent of Piton Canot

days_plan.itin_title: MAURITIUS FROM NORTH TO SOUTH — BEACHES, NATURE AND WATERFALLS

visits.text: Route to the High Plains and visit to the volcanic crater of Trou aux Cerfs in Curepipe.
Exploration of Grand Bassin, sacred Hindu lake and important pilgrimage site.
Visit of the colonial town of Curepipe and its old Creole houses.

activities.text: Shopping in the model boat shops, local crafts of Curepipe.
Hike to Piton de la Petite Rivière Noire, highest point of the island at 828m.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Morning excursion to swim with dolphins in Tamarin Bay

activities.text: Departure preparation and transfer to the airport

days_plan.itin_title: MAURITIUS FROM NORTH TO SOUTH — BEACHES, NATURE AND WATERFALLS

visits.text: Boat excursion to swim with dolphins off Tamarin.
Snorkeling in Tamarin pass to observe rays and sea turtles.
Visit to Black River Gorges National Park with its hiking trails.
Hike in Black River Gorges Park to the Pétrin viewpoint.
Observation of endemic birds like the kestrel and the pink pigeon.
Picnic in the forest with panoramic view of the west coast.

activities.text: Swimming and relaxation on the long beach of Flic en Flac.
Dinner at a seafood restaurant by the sea.
Visit to the village of Chamarel and exploration of its art galleries and workshops.
Scuba diving session at Cathedral Dive Site near Flic en Flac.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS
AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: First swim in the turquoise lagoon of Grand Baie.
Exploration of Grand Baie center, its shops and local art galleries.
Catamaran excursion to the northern islets with snorkeling on coral reefs.
Visit to Gabriel islet and swimming in its crystal-clear waters.
Barbecue lunch on the catamaran with grilled lobster.
Return to Grand Baie and visit to the Mauritius aquarium to discover marine wildlife.
Exploration of the shops and art galleries of Sunset Boulevard.
Swimming in the turquoise lagoon and relaxation on the public beach.
Quad or buggy excursion in the interior lands to explore plantations and villages.
Visit to a tea plantation and tasting of Mauritian vanilla tea.
Discovery of a workshop manufacturing scale models of traditional boats.

activities.text: Sunset on La Cuvette beach, small quiet cove.
Dinner in a seaside Creole restaurant with grilled fish.
Snorkeling session to observe tropical fish.
Return in late afternoon and relaxation on Pereybère beach.
Introduction to scuba diving or beginner's diving baptism.
Sunset cruise with sega music and Mauritian punch.
Deep-sea fishing session in open waters to catch marlin and tuna.
Mauritian gastronomic dinner with fish curry and octopus vindaye.

visits.text: Scenic route to Le Morne and visit to the UNESCO site, symbol of the fight against slavery.
Hiking at the foot of Le Morne Brabant with guide to understand the history of maroon slaves.
Relaxation on Le Morne beach, considered one of the most beautiful on the island.
7 waterfalls hike from Henrietta
Seaplane flight over the underwater waterfall of Le Morne
Tea Route via Saint Aubin, Bois Chéri and Domaine des Aubineaux
Visit to the sacred lake of Grand Bassin and its Hindu temples
Guided ascent of Morne Brabant (UNESCO)
Morne Beach and swimming in the turquoise lagoon

activities.text: Kitesurfing session or windsurfing initiation in the Le Morne lagoon.
Sunset observation from the beach with view of the iconic rock.
Swimming and relaxation at Flic en Flac beach
Swimming at La Prairie beach
Relaxation and sunset on Morne Beach

visits.text: Macondé coastal road and Gris Gris beach
Discovery of Mahébourg village and the waterfront
Exploration of Blue Bay marine park and glass-bottom boat excursion

activities.text: Snorkeling at Blue Bay

days_plan.itin_title: MAURITIUS FROM NORTH TO SOUTH — BEACHES, NATURE AND WATERFALLS

visits.text: Visit of Eureka Maison Créole, 19th century colonial residence with lush gardens.
Hike in the nature reserve of Ile d'Ambre via the northeast coast.
Exploration of the Labourdonnais estate with its distillery and citrus plantation.

activities.text: Tasting of fresh fruit juices and artisanal jams at the estate.
Visit to the Maison de l'Assiette to discover Mauritian ceramic craftsmanship.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Visit of Port Louis, vibrant capital, and its colorful and lively central market.
Discovery of the Caudan Waterfront seafront with its shops and restaurants.
Visit of the Blue Penny Museum on postal history and rare stamps of Mauritius.

activities.text: Street food lunch at the market: mine frit, bol renversé, Mauritian briani.
Climb to Fort Adelaide for a panoramic view of the city and port.

days_plan.itin_title: AUTHENTIC MAURITIUS - 15 DAYS BETWEEN TURQUOISE LAGOON AND MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Discovery of Trou aux Biches beach, calm lagoon and coconut trees
Mont Choisy Beach, large bay bordered by casuarina trees
Red-roofed church of Cap Malheureux and view of Coin de Mire
Coastal walk to Bain Boeuf beach
Pamplemousses Garden and its giant water lilies
L'Aventure du Sucre Museum in Beau Plan
Visit to Château de Labourdonnais and rum tasting
Catamaran excursion to Île aux Cerfs from Trou d'Eau Douce

activities.text: Snorkeling to observe sea turtles
Sunset observation over the lagoon
Swimming at Butte à l'Herbe beach
Relaxation at Belle Mare beach if weather permits
Snorkeling and swimming in the lagoon

days_plan.itin_title: MAURITIUS FROM NORTH TO SOUTH — BEACHES, NATURE AND WATERFALLS

visits.text: Journey to the east coast and visit to Île aux Cerfs by boat from Trou d'Eau Douce.
Exploration of the paradise beaches of Île aux Cerfs and swimming in the lagoon.
Creole lunch on the island in a restaurant with feet in the sand.
Visit to the natural park of Vallée de Ferney with its endemic forests and viewpoints.
Guided hike in the reserve to observe Mauritian fauna and flora.
Discovery of the coastal village of Mahébourg and its colorful market.

activities.text: Kayak or paddle session in the calm waters of the lagoon.
Walk on Belle Mare beach at the end of the day, one of the longest on the island.
Visit to the Naval Museum of Mahébourg on the maritime history of the island.
Tasting of local street food at the market: dholl puri, gâteaux piments, samosas.
